oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Performing Identity
Musicians
Folk poetry, American -- African American authors; Folk songs, English -- United States; African Americans -- Songs and music
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Former Director of the Center for Popular Music, Charles K. Wolfe, published an updated version of Thomas Talley's Negro Folk Rhymes in 1991.
